Sunday, Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell ( R-Ky.) told host David Letterman Gregory that he did not ''have much to add'' to what Hillary Clinton had said on how the administration was handling the uprising. I don't have any criticism of Barack Obama or Secretary Hillary Clinton at this point, Mitch McConnell added after he was pressed by Gregory.
